import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Bulk delete categories"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/categories/bulk/delete"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Deletes multiple categories in a single request, supporting explicit CategoryId lists or select-all behavior with filters. Use this for administrative cleanup when many categories should be removed at once instead of issuing individual DELETE calls.

**Prerequisites**
1. **CategoryIds** - Use [POST /api/v1.0/categories/v2](/docs/api/categories/search-categories-v-2) to locate categories and extract `Items[].CategoryId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Search categories to assemble the CategoryId list (or define filters for select-all).
2. [POST /api/v1.0/categories/bulk/delete](/docs/api/categories/bulk-delete-categories) with CategoryIds or IsSelectAll plus filters.

**Minimal Required Fields**: CategoryIds (or IsSelectAll with CategoriesRequest filters).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>
